name: Hailey Newsome
text: Great deals the delivery drivers are usually on it. I loveeeee love their wings and getting white sauce pizza with red sauce to dip it in. I am writing this review bc I want them to have free parm and peppers again :(

name: Peter Zuniga
text: I was hungry till I saw this pizza, then salvaged what I could with the crust and threw the rest out. Terrible don't order from here. In fact who ever cooked this Pizza should be fired.

name: Jeffrey Cogan
text: The pizza was only ok.  The thick crust was good, but the pizza as a whole product was just not very good as package.

name: Chloë H.
text: Ordered 2 large pizzas for delivery yesterday and they arrived hot, promptly, and mostly delicious! I think the garlic parmesan sauce recipe is bland and the peppers sliced paper-thin, but overall a great experience! Definitely better than the nearest Dominos, definitely will order from this location again!

text: They forgot my food and refused to give me my money back or make up for it

text: Service was fast. You can watch them prepare you order. Employees are courteous.

text: This location has really gone downhill. I will not return to this location. I will go to dominoes instead. My crust was way overdone and the toppings were so skimpy that multiple slices did not have them. I would have had a better pizza from little cesars. The wait time was lengthy as well.
